name: Abhishek

projects.title: NODE FLOW AUTOMATION
projects.description: Node Flow Automation is a tool for creating and managing flow diagrams effortlessly. You can draw diagrams intuitively and seamlessly navigate between nodes. Easily download your diagrams as images or upload JSON files to create diagrams instantly.

projects.title: BOOKING-APP
projects.description: A responsive booking app with a sleek UI, featuring a dark mode, a favorites list, and multiple other functionalities to enhance the renting experience

projects.title: CHAT AI WEB APP
projects.description: An AI-powered chat web app providing intelligent and interactive communication with users

projects.title: 1:1 Meeting APP
projects.description: Utilizing Socket.IO, this project develops a 1:1 Meeting App that enables real-time, interactive meetings between users, ensuring seamless communication and connectivity

projects.title: NODE BASED COLOR GEN
projects.description: Using the React Flow library, this project changes the background color dynamically when nodes are connected, creating an interactive visual experience

services.title: Aceternity UI
services.description: Aceternity UI is a sleek and modern user interface framework designed for building intuitive and responsive web applications. It offers a comprehensive set of components and tools, making it easy for developers to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces.

services.title: React FLOW
services.description: React Flow is a powerful library for building interactive node-based applications in React. It provides a comprehensive set of features and components to create and manage flow-based diagrams, such as process flows, decision trees, and workflow editors

services.title: Material UI
services.description: Material-UI (MUI) is a popular React component library that implements Google's Material Design guidelines. It provides a comprehensive set of pre-styled, customizable components that help developers build consistent, visually appealing, and responsive user interfaces quickly.

services.title: Framer Motion
services.description: Framer Motion is a powerful, open-source animation library for React that enables developers to create smooth, declarative animations and interactions. It combines ease of use with advanced capabilities, making it a popular choice for both simple and complex animation needs.

aboutpara: As a Software Developer Intern at RCube Consulting, my current engagement involves utilizing Express.js, Material-UI, and Javascript to develop robust web solutions. With a strong foundation in Information Technology from my ongoing Master's at Chandigarh University and a Bachelor's from the University of Mumbai, I am committed to honing my technical skills and contributing to the tech community. My participation in neoG Camp and a brief stint with the Google Developers Group exemplify my dedication to continuous learning and professional growth. The practical experience I'm gaining at RCube Consulting complements the theoretical knowledge from my advanced studies, positioning me to effectively tackle diverse challenges in the software development landscape.
